Legal.termsDescription: Recipio terms of service and conditions
Legal.privacyDescription: Recipio privacy policy and data protection information
Legal.kvkkDescription: Disclosure text within the scope of the Personal Data Protection Law
Legal.section1Content: These terms of service apply when using the Recipio platform. By using the platform, you agree to these terms.
Legal.section2Content: Users agree to the following responsibilities:
Legal.section2Item3: Not using the platform for illegal purposes
Legal.section3Content: Recipes and content shared on the platform are the responsibility of users. Recipio is not responsible for user content.
Legal.section4Content: Recipio reserves the right to modify or terminate the platform without prior notice.
Legal.section5Content: For questions, you can contact us at info@recipio.com.
Legal.privacySection1Content: Recipio collects personal data necessary to provide our services. This data includes email address, username, and profile information.
Legal.privacySection2Content: Collected data is used for the following purposes:
Legal.privacySection3Content: The security of your data is our priority. We use modern encryption technologies and security measures.
Legal.privacySection4Content: We do not share your personal data with third parties, except for legal obligations.
Legal.privacySection5Content: You have the right to access, correct, delete, and object to your data under data protection laws.
Legal.kvkkSection1Content: Within the scope of Law No. 6698 on the Protection of Personal Data (KVKK), the data controller is Recipio.
Legal.kvkkSection2Content: The personal data we process includes:
Legal.kvkkSection3Content: Your personal data is processed for the purposes of providing our services, account management, and fulfilling legal obligations.
Legal.kvkkSection4Content: Your personal data is processed based on the legal reasons specified in Articles 5 and 6 of the KVKK.
Legal.kvkkSection5Content: In accordance with Article 11 of the KVKK, you have the right to learn whether your personal data is being processed, request information if processed, learn the purpose of processing and whether it is used appropriately, know the third parties to whom it is transferred domestically or abroad, request correction if incomplete or incorrectly processed, and request deletion or destruction.
